#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <queue>
using namespace std;
#define lim 10000001
#define p(x) cerr<<#x<<":"<<x<<"\n"
int ll,r,d,x,cs,n;
int D[lim],M[lim];
queue<int> Q;
void push(int x,int d,int m)
{
  if(x<lim)
  {
    M[x]=m;
    D[x]=d;
    //Q.push(x);
  }
}
int main()
{
  /*ll=r=3;
  for(d=0;d<27;d++)
  {
    printf("%d %d %d\n",d,ll,r);
    ll=2*ll-d;
    r=2*r-d+2;
  }*/
  push(3,0,3);
  int s=0;
  //while(!Q.empty())
  for(x=3;x<lim;x++)
    if(M[x])
  {   
    s++;
    //x=Q.front();Q.pop();
    push(2*x-D[x],D[x]+1,1);
    push(2*x-D[x]+2,D[x]+1,2);
  }
  scanf("%d",&cs);
  while(cs--)
  {
    scanf("%d",&n);
    if(M[n]==1)
      printf("LEFT\n");
    else if(M[n]==2)
      printf("RIGHT\n");
    else
      printf("NO\n");
  }
	return 0;
}
